findings.title: PTRP - Potential Transfer Revert Propagation
findings.description: The contract sends funds to a marketingWallet as part of the transfer flow, which may revert from incoming payment and propagate to the tokenâ€™s contract.

findings.title: PVC - Price Volatility Concern
findings.description: The contract accumulates tokens from taxes to swap them for ETH, which may lead to significant price volatility if the variable is set to a big number.

findings.title: L02 - State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: State variables can be declared as constant using the constant keyword, which means that the value of the state variable cannot be changed after it has been set.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The contract does not follow the Solidity style guide for writing clean and consistent code.

findings.title: L07 - Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: The contract is missing events that are required to notify external parties or clients about events that have occurred within the contract.

findings.title: L14 - Uninitialized Variables in Local Scope
findings.description: The contract uses uninitialized local variables, which can lead to unpredictable behavior and potentially cause errors.

findings.title: L16 - Validate Variable Setters
findings.description: The contract performs operations on variables that have been configured with user-supplied input without proper checks, which can lead to problems when the value is zero.

findings.title: L18 - Multiple Pragma Directives
findings.description: The contract includes multiple conflicting pragma directives, which can produce unexpected errors.

findings.title: L19 - Stable Compiler Version
findings.description: The contract uses an unstable compiler version, which can lead to vulnerabilities and undiscovered bugs.
